caption.p: Survival (mean and SE) of (a, c) Plutella xylostella from L2 to pupation and (b, d) of Pieris brassicae from L1 to adult eclosion when developing on Brassica nigra plants exposed to different rainfall regimes: none (R00), only before caterpillars were introduced (R10), only after caterpillars were introduced (R01), or during both phases (R11). Insect herbivores were exposed to different frequencies of rainfall: (a, b) once (20 min) per day or (c, d) three times (5 min each) per day.
